name: Ritu
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: Happy Birthday to the most incredible woman I know! May your day be filled with love, laughter, and all the things that bring you joy. Here's to another year of fabulous adventures and unforgettable memories. You deserve the world and more, and I'm so grateful to have you. Cheers to you, and may this year be your best one yet!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
